text: Median CRP level at admission was 21 mg / l ( IQR : 6 - 63 , mean : 56 . 6 mg / l ) , median PCT level was 4 . 6 ng / ml ( IQR : 0 . 4 - 26 . 4 , mean : 31 . 5 ng / ml ) . Median CRP and PCT levels were higher in hypoxemic compared with non - hypoxemic pneumonia cases ( P = 0 . 03 and P = 0 . 007 , respectively ) .
